title: Bit slow to get going but loved it. Great horror/ thriller
review:
It is definitely worth seeing. Well acted will directed will produced well-written just a good all round film.
Original with a satisfying ending (ie not ambiguous). I Can't recommend this highly enough. Hope it has good success, I expect word of mouth could be strong for this.

movie_title: Tae Guk Gi: The Brotherhood of War
title: Shows how a war film can be made
review:
You remember the first 5 minutes of Saving Private Ryan? Well this does that for 2 hours. Only better. And no Tom Hanks. Or Matt Damon
Great film. Must watch
